channel.title: What Did You Get Banned For
channel.description:
whats the dumbest reason in runescape that u ever got banned for?
i got muted for 3 days once for talking to my friend in a cc about the clan FOE and how he shuld maybe join cuz hes a good pure jagex said i was advertising a website???
one time i also got perm banned for telling a guy in tehnoobshow cc about frugooscape

item.title: What Did You Get Banned For
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Pk Range502, post:39, topic:289888”]I Got Banned Cause I Said To Jagex Mod Your Just A Little Noob Get A Life You Dont Have a Wife :D[/quote]They don’t ban people that say stuff like that, they just walk away or stand there.

Read full topic
item.source: What Did You Get Banned For

item.title: What Did You Get Banned For
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I was looking through my old offences, and I just had to post this.
I can’t believe I said that, and I can’t beleive I was perm banned for that…

This account has been found to be in breach of Rule 1; Offensive Language.

Rule 1 states:

You must not use any language which may be considered offensive, racist, obscene or otherwise inappropriate.

Please consider the following evidence:

dillingo I will kill your family!

Read full topic
item.source: What Did You Get Banned For

item.title: What Did You Get Banned For
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I got banned on 14 accounts for account phishing, I don’t know how but they banned my main account and I had done nothing wrong on it, the reason was account scamming, no evidence either.

~Dawis14
~Smoked Guam
~Djregata (Unbanned now, locked though I think, combat 96)
~Derick Yang1 (Unbanned and returned to the original owner, combat 92)
~SinThe Tic, or Sin The Tic (Not sure, still banned though, permanent)
~Evil Magicaz (I think locked, still pending unlock request from the original owner maybe.)
~Kre Tin (Unlocked and returned to the original owner, combat 120+)
~Sheep243 (Unlocked and returned to the original owner, combat 133)
~Rstoguide (Locked, pending request from me of course.)
~Da Enzo Dude (Locked, no other information.)
~Red Saffi (Banned permanently)
~Rongroge (Unbanned, was only temp. ban)
~Ags Pked (I think that is the name, I don’t remember, but from what I remember it’s slapped with a life-time guarantee [color=red]BANNED.
~Foleosy (No info.)
~Robo gir 14 (Banned.)

There are probably 20 more accounts, I don’t remember all of them but those are just some names I had listed down.

Read full topic
item.source: What Did You Get Banned For

item.title: What Did You Get Banned For
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Got banned for 5 days + a perm mute for spamming “faygit” in the chat while pking in Varrock wilderness. Then I was unmuted and all my blackmarks were removed a year later.

Read full topic

item.title: What Did You Get Banned For
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

i gotz 1 day muted by a mod for asking “3k pl0x” either it was cause i was lvl 116 at the time and he saw my gear b4 i put newb armour on, or they’re too poor to give me 3k

got muted for saying someone failed at fight pits and should go back chickens…

uhhhh

got 14 day ban b.c (6 years ago) some newb reported me for telling my friend to log on my other account so i could give it stuff xD

Read full topic
item.source: What Did You Get Banned For

item.title: What Did You Get Banned For
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

I was permanently muted for saying “Nah - nah - nah - rape!”. I don’t know why… I guess rape is not something to be made fun of, but I don’t see how saying a word is ‘making fun of it’. Jagex is just too strict.

Read full topic
item.source: What Did You Get Banned For
